Articles.Content: I think it's clear many systems exist which aren't present in the current EA build of the game. Namely, reentry heating, better atmospheric scattering, and better/more 3-d planetary surfaces, not to mention the actual items on the roadmap. Doesn't mean they don't exist, just means they're not in a state to be present in the EA build.
Off-topic personal remarks have been removed. Please talk about the game rather than each other.
